name: Galactic Tree Frog
description:
Play as a valiant frog! Fight strange aliens and explore old ruins! Collect loot and unleash devastating firepower on your foes! Take a break from being a mammal for just a little while.

Galactic Tree Frog am indie shooter survival game. It features a semi-randomly generated map, a variety of weapons plus upgrades, and a diverse group of enemies. See how long you can survive!
